item.title: 美国国债下跌，创 2019 年回购爆仓以来最严重跌势
item.description: 国债下跌，29 万亿美元的国债市场正走向自 2019 年美国金融体系动荡迫使美联储采取行动以来最严重的单周亏损。【原文：Treasuries fell, as the $29 trillion market heads toward its worst weekly loss since turmoil in the plumbing of the US financial system forced action from the Federal Reserve in 2019.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称关税影响比许多美国人看到的更广泛
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，对进口商品征收关税对物价的影响将比许多美国人预期的要广泛。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said tariffs on imported goods will have a wider impact on prices than many Americans anticipate.】

item.title: 皮布尔斯、麦克尼利为办公楼改住房筹集资金
item.description: 由开发商唐-皮布尔斯（Don Peebles）和前凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：A new investment firm started by developer Don Peebles and former Carlyle Group Inc. partner Doug McNeely is seeking to raise as much as $1.5 billion to convert offices to housing across the US.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克通过出售 X 债务为摩根士丹利带来盈利增长
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）愿意与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）坚持到底，这为其第一季度业绩带来了健康的推动力。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s willingness to stick it out with Elon Musk is giving its first-quarter results a healthy boost.】

item.title: 德国推动本土防空系统发展以抵消 "爱国者 "计划的影响
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德国政府正在向制造商代傲公司施压，要求其加快研发一种国产、射程更远的防空系统，以减少对美国制造的 "爱国者 "设备的依赖。【原文：Germany’s government is pressing manufacturer Diehl to accelerate development of a homegrown, longer-range air-defense system to reduce its reliance on US-made Patriot units, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度探讨在 90 天内达成美国临时贸易协定
item.description: 据一位高级官员称，如果双方互惠互利，印度可以在 90 天内与唐纳德-特朗普政府达成临时贸易协定，这增加了南亚国家相对不受华盛顿关税战略影响的希望。【原文：India can reach a provisional trade agreement with the Donald Trump administration in 90 days if the offers are mutually beneficial, according to a senior official, boosting hopes that the South Asian nation can emerge relatively unscathed from Washington’s tariff strategy.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行对 Axa IM 交易的资本处理方案遭欧洲央行反对
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，欧洲中央银行对实施一项规则持否定态度，该规则可能会减少法国巴黎银行计划收购安盛资产管理公司（Axa SA）对其资本金的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank has taken a negative view on applying a rule that might have reduced the impact on BNP Paribas SA’s capital from its planned acquisition of Axa SA’s asset manager, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 尼日利亚独善其身，非洲暂停关税引发的货币干预措施
item.description: 即使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策颠覆了市场和全球贸易，非洲国家也没有急于支撑本国货币和动用有限的外汇储备。【原文：African nations aren’t rushing to prop up their local currencies and tap their limited foreign-exchange reserves, even as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs upend markets and global trade.】

item.title: 特朗普能源部长称对油价的担忧是错误的
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特说，石油市场的下跌被夸大了，他预计美国原油生产商将继续增产。【原文：US Energy Secretary Chris Wright said the selloff in the oil market is overblown, and he expects American crude produces to keep increasing production.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利认为失调不值得干预
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，他没有看到国债市场出现值得美国央行干预的压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said he’s not seeing stresses in the Treasury market that would merit an intervention by the US central bank.】

item.title: 受能源拖累，美国生产者价格意外下跌
item.description: 美国 3 月份的批发价格意外创下 2023 年 10 月以来的最大降幅，受到能源成本的抑制，为关税浪潮前的温和通胀增添了证据。【原文：US wholesale prices unexpectedly fell in March by the most since October 2023, restrained by energy costs and adding to evidence of tame inflation leading up to a wave of tariffs.】

item.title: 巴西通胀创两年新高，加息规模存疑
item.description: 巴西上个月的年通胀率略高于预期，达到两年来的最高水平，这给正在考虑下一次加息幅度的决策者们带来了压力。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation accelerated slightly more than expected last month, hitting its highest level in two years and pressuring policymakers as they mull the size of their next interest rate hike.】

item.title: 西北大学收到 100 份联邦项目停工令
item.description: 西北大学表示，获得联邦拨款的研究人员收到了 100 份停工令，包括医学和工程学领域的项目都受到了影响。【原文：Northwestern University said researchers with federal grants received 100 stop-work orders, hitting projects in areas including medicine and engineering.】

item.title: 意大利牛仔裤大亨伦佐-罗索（Renzo Rosso）即使在范思哲遭遇挫折后仍对交易充满渴望
item.description: 伦佐-罗索（Renzo Rosso）是意大利时尚大亨，因创办 Diesel 牛仔裤而声名鹊起，即使在收购范思哲品牌受挫后，他仍在寻找新的交易。【原文：Renzo Rosso, the Italian fashion mogul who made his name as the founder of Diesel jeans, is on the lookout for new deals — even after a setback in his bid to buy the Versace brand.】

item.title: 凯勒-萨特说，瑞银投资银行的上限由他们决定
item.description: 瑞士财政部长卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）对瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）提出的为其投资银行规模设定永久性上限的建议表示冷淡，认为这并不能改变她对未来资本要求的看法。【原文：Swiss Finance Minister Karin Keller-Sutter gave a cold shoulder to UBS Group AG’s offer of a permanent cap on the size of its investment bank, suggesting it won’t do much to change her mind on future capital requirements.】

item.title: 艾因霍恩称关税将迫使美联储今年采取更多削减措施
item.description: 绿光资本（Greenlight Capital）的戴维-艾因霍恩（David Einhorn）称关税是 "累退税"，将迫使美国联邦储备委员会采取行动，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统高于预期的全球关税令投资者震惊，并导致市场暴跌。【原文：Greenlight Capital’s David Einhorn called tariffs “a regressive tax” that will force the US Federal Reserve to act, as President Donald Trump’s higher-than-expected global tariffs shocked investors and sent markets tumbling.】

item.title: 投资者试图逃离陷入困境的巴西银行，导致债券收益率上升
item.description: 个人投资者正试图抛售 Banco Master SA 的债券，从而推高了收益率，使这家陷入困境的贷款机构更难筹集到短期债务所需的现金。【原文：Individual investors are trying to dump Banco Master SA bonds, pushing yields higher and making it tougher for the struggling lender to raise cash needed for short-term obligations.】

item.title: 美国股指期货上涨，大型银行开启盈利季
item.description: 由于投资者关注美国大型银行的盈利报告，美国股票期货收窄了早些时候的跌幅。【原文：US stock futures pared earlier losses as investors pored over earnings reports from big US banks.】

item.title: 欧盟顶级矿业公司面临艰巨任务，以控制不断加速的现金消耗
item.description: JSW SA 已要求波兰社会保障局允许其推迟今年的付款，这是欧盟最大的焦煤开采商在价格下跌和成本上升的情况下消耗更多现金而面临困境的最新迹象。【原文：JSW SA has asked Poland’s social security office to allow it to delay this year’s payments in the latest sign of the struggles the European Union’s biggest coking coal miner is facing as it burns through more cash amid dwindling prices and rising costs.】

item.title: 欧洲央行排除重启股息禁令的可能，因为银行正经受着动荡的考验
item.description: 欧洲最高银行业监管机构排除了在近期市场崩溃后对股息进行全面限制的可能性，称迄今为止，贷款机构都很好地经受住了全球贸易战的影响。【原文：Europe’s top banking watchdog ruled out blanket restrictions on dividends in the wake of the recent market meltdown, saying lenders have so far weathered the fallout from the global trade war well.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行已准备好在必要时使用现有工具
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德重申了欧洲央行为维护稳定而进行干预的承诺。【原文：President Christine Lagarde reaffirmed the European Central Bank’s commitment to intervention in favor of stability.】

item.title: 捷克领导人敦促美国国会继续资助自由欧洲电台
item.description: 捷克议会领导人呼吁美国国会保留自由欧洲电台/自由电台的出口，以此在专制国家促进言论自由和民主价值观。【原文：Czech parliamentary leaders called on the US Congress to preserve Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty outlet as a way to promote free speech and democratic values in authoritarian nations.】

item.title: 美国公司正在失去对欧洲信贷投资者的吸引力
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）不可预测的关税政策给全球最大经济体的前景蒙上了阴影，欧洲信贷投资者正在减少对美国的投资，以防止其投资组合出现衰退。【原文：European credit investors are dialing back exposure to the US to recession proof their portfolios as President Donald Trump’s unpredictable tariff policy clouds the outlook for the world’s biggest economy.】

item.description: 第一季度，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. pulled in a less-than-expected $83 billion of client money to its investment funds in the first quarter, which ended just days before President Donald Trump unleashed tariffs that stoked extreme volatility across stock and bond markets.】
